thread.section_title: Ski.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ski.com | www.ski.com
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: I turned to ski.com to help me plan a trip for my husband and I.He had skied out west once in his youth and wanted to return with me. I had many questions because I am an intermediate skier and I wanted groomed blue trails that were wide and less crowded. My husband is a more advance skier and he would enjoy a little more steep slopes when I am done for the day. Lori from ski. com was very patient and knowledgeable and fixed us up with an affordable package in a short amount of time. She even helped me to finalize the payment in the evening because I was having trouble with the website accepting my payment.
